content: this pattern is available for free from knitty you ll need a worsted weight yarn and a strand of lace weight mohair for the main color and about 10-12 yards/9-11 meters of two other colors for the leaf and flower motif the flower motif is knitted as you go not embroidered later…and it s easier than it looks yarn - worsted weight wool and a lace weight mohair held together for main color approximately 90-130 yards each depending on size chosen - two scraps approx 10-12 yards/9-11m each for the leaves and flowers dk will make more subtle flowers worsted weight will make more pronounced flowers notions - size 7 needles i prefer 16 circulars for hats with double pointed needles to finish the crown - stitch marker to mark beginning of round yarn substitution ideas - kraemer yarns naturally nazareth - malabrigo mohair - universal yarns lush mohair this is discontinued but might be in stashes it s slightly thicker so it will make a stiffer fabric but that s fine - handspun alpaca or wool berroco ultra alpaca kraemer yarns tatami worsted for the flower bobbles april 6 2025 available in danish translation courtesy of marianne holmen https //strikkeglad dk/54458/foraarsblomster/
